[MASK] [MASK] RC : I have an appointment at 5 o'clock in the cardiology department . I do n't know where that is . Could you tell me please ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : Sorry , I do n't have this information . I 'll call a nurse to come and help you . [MASK] ARI : Thank you . See you soon . Have a nice day . [MASK] [end] RC : Thank you , bye . # thank ( ) ; bye ( ) LP : See you soon . You too , have a nice day . # bye ( )

[MASK] [MASK] ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . RC : Ok , thank you . [MASK] [MASK] ARI : Thank you . src: LC : Well , it 's not possible to get information on appointments . But um , how long does it last because there are three phases , if I understood correctly there are three ... three types of appointments , I 'd like to know how long it will last in total . ARI : I 'm sorry , but I ca n't help you . # cant-help ( ) LC : Where can I get information ? # request ( location ( reception ) ) @ G ( LC , go-to ( reception ) ) [start] ARI : I 'm afraid I ca n't help you . [MASK] RP : Ok , I 'm going to ask you a question ARI . I have an appointment at Broca hospital on the 25th , but I 'm not going to be able to make it . What do I do ? Who should I speak to ? Should I phone , what should I do ? ARI : Sorry , I do n't have this information . [MASK] LC : Is there a reception or a telephone number ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : Yes . [MASK] [MASK] ARI : Sorry , I do n't have this information . [MASK] LC : Well , in the meantime , what we can maybe do , since I 've just found my appointment paper and I know what time it starts , we could maybe go for lunch . From what time until what time can we have lunch ? [MASK] [MASK] LC : And ... Is it ? ARI : Sorry , I do n't have this information . [MASK] LC : And ... Is it possible to have lunch with someone who is hospitalised ? ARI : Yes of course . [MASK] LC : How should I do this ? Do I need to make a reservation ? ARI : No . [MASK] LC : How far in advance ? ARI : No . [MASK] LC : I 'm going to take the lift . I do n't remember where it is to go to the appointment room and see if someone can give information on appointments . [MASK] [MASK] [end] ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . src: [start] ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? [MASK] LP : Hello I I 'd really like I 'm hungry I 'd really like to eat . And is the room air-conditioned ? The restaurant ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : Yes . Of course . [MASK] [MASK] ARI : Lunch will be offered at midday if you have afternoon appointments . A snack may be offered after your appointment with the nurse . [MASK] [MASK] LP : So , Mrs companion , do you know what I 'll be eating today ? [MASK] [MASK] RC : Oh but no , I do n't know , I 'm going to ask . [MASK] RC : Can you tell us if there is a cafeteria ? We 've been very well received here , and I have no directions . I 'm looking for a cafeteria to have a coffee or a hot chocolate . [MASK] [MASK] ARI : There are a few options available as part of your visit , and there 's also a cafeteria on the ground floor . [MASK] [MASK] RC : Can you tell me where on the ground floor ? Right , left , straight ahead ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . [MASK] [MASK] RC : Okay , thank you . [MASK] [MASK] RC : Um also ... [MASK] LP : Um what time can we have lunch ? [MASK] [MASK] [end] RC : Can you tell me the cafeteria opening hours ? Then it 's the second door on the left . # inform ( directions ( lifts ) ) RC : Um for the lifts ? ARI : Yes . # affirm ( ) RC : You already told me this for the cafeteria . So the lifts and the cafeteria are right next to each other ? ARI : Absolutely . # affirm ( ) RC : Oh , okay , thank you very much . # thank ( ) ARI : Thank you . # thank ( ) ARI : See you around .
